meanings.def: a part of something that is separate from the other parts or can be considered separately
examples: She cleaned a small segment of the painting.
Lines divided the area into segments.
The changes will affect only a small segment of the population.
They divided the bone into equal segments.

meanings.def: one of the sections of an orange, a lemon, etc.
a part of a circle separated from the rest by a single line
the smallest speech sound that a word can be divided into
to divide something into different parts
examples: Market researchers often segment the population on the basis of age and social class.
The worm has a segmented body (= with different sections joined together).
